author: stux
title: Good way to get some good sets and PF parts
review:
The subsets are delivered with boxes, which is good.

I wanted the PF expansion pack, the mini sets and the big digger... so was a perfect way for me to save some money :)

I've had fun building the little technic sets with some a keen 4 year old that I know :)

I rated the superpack so highly because of the diversity of the building/playing experiences
